Package: com.citytechinc.aem.prosper.builders

[Groovy] Class BindingsBuilder

    • com.citytechinc.aem.prosper.builders.BindingsBuilder

    • Builder for creating Bindings instances containing WCM objects for use in Sightly components.

      • Constructor Summary

      • Method Detail

        • void addService(Class<T> serviceType, T instance)

          Add a service instance to the mock Sling Script Helper.

          Parameters:
          serviceType - type of service to register
          instance - service instance (real or mocked)

        • void addServices(Class<T> serviceType, T[] instances, String filter)

          Add service instances and associated filter criteria to the mock Sling Script Helper. This method can be called multiple times to register different service and filter value combinations.

          Parameters:
          serviceType - type of service to register
          instances - array of service instances for the given service type and filter
          filter - filter string
